# RelevantIntentManager

**Class**

A type that saves relevant intents.

## Declaration

```swift
final class RelevantIntentManager
```

## Instance Methods

- **updateRelevantIntents(_:)**: Give the system the list of relevant intents for your app. To replace the list, call this method again, passing in a new list of relevant intents.  To remove all relevant intents associated with your app, call this method with an empty array.

## Type Properties

- **shared**: Get the singleton shared instance of this class.

## Intent relevancy

- **RelevantIntent**: A type that specifies an intent and its relevance to the user.
- **RelevantContext**: Contextual clues the system uses to show relevant widgets in the Smart Stack on watchOS.
